item.description:

Content Creation:

Develop engaging, high-quality content for various social media platforms including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok, and Pinterest.
Produce a variety of content types, including graphics, videos, blog posts, infographics, and other multimedia formats.
Collaborate with the marketing team to align content with brand voice, goals, and current marketing campaigns.

Monitor social media channels for trends, feedback, and potential issues, and report insights to the marketing team.

Collaboration and Reporting:

Work closely with the marketing team to develop and execute comprehensive social media strategies.
Provide regular updates and reports on content performance, social media metrics, and advertising ROI.
Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute creative ideas for campaigns and content strategies.
